TopicTitle: [0.25] Lionhead Aerospace Inc. - Icarus v0.4 updated

Articles.Content:
That looks pretty nice there yogui Quick question, how big is the Icarus going to be, and what sort of crew sizes will it be able to support?
As big as I can make it^^, right now it fills the VAB from the top to the bottom. Radial docks can carry a 1m diameter probe. About the crew size I think it will be around 5-6 members.
Just an FYI in case you wasn't aware, your A-1 Asterix probe .cfg is missing the "title = " line so it shows up as unknown mystery component.
I'm still getting the point of control/camera shift bug when launching Thor.

I'm still getting the point of control/camera shift bug when launching Thor.
It seems to be a plugin issue. Sometimes, this happens when the probes goes too fast. Try with less acceleration.
The airbags are really awesome. Is there any chance for a separate release containing airbag thingies in different sizes, sor sticking differently sized landers in?
There was a surface attach airbags mod for .18, should be compatible for .21 with PART{}. Here it is:http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/cp-airbag-system/
Yogi is the project dead?
Of course not, he probably has RL probs or is just tired(from a weekend of partying)
The project is not dead but had increase with a base carrier ship with a droping pod base. There's a lot of work to do before any release. I'll post some screenshots of WIP.
Here some screenshots I promised you:
They are great! Do you have any info about how the project is going on you would like to share with us?

The project is making a base with drop pods (deploys to activate). Different drop pods are planned (habitat, utility, hydroponic, reco, communication...). A carrier ship will be planned, based on the Icarus parts. I want this mod to use ressources like oxygen, water, food...

For now the project is in planing phase. Seing what part is needed, if everything is doable...

Icarus project is not dead, it's just growing to something very big. May be I'll release it by bits, first Icarus ship and then the base pods.

Ther's a lot of work in front of me so be patient I'll post news as soon as I can.
I like where this is going. Take your time Yogui, we'll wait patiently
Do you reckon you'll be able to make the Thor probe's instruments, collect science points when they get added to the game?

Do you reckon you'll be able to make the Thor probe's instruments, collect science points when they get added to the game?
I'm very interested in the upcoming fetures, and be sure my mods will be updated with these new collect capacities.

That's good to hear. Your landers are always the first things I send out when a new version comes out.

Adding some science goals to the game, for me at least, is potentially the most exciting thing they have added in a long time.
I just love the European pack! The models are amazingly well done, my only gripe is that the booster-Vulcain balance on Ariane 5 seems a little off, but I fixed that myself. Great work Yogui87!

Here a little video of the early tests of the PodHab: a drop pod deploying into a habitation module:

Textures are just placeholders.
Wow....I think that gives HOME a run for its money, when this project is finished I think we might have something truely unique, and ready for a trip around the kerbin system.
Nice, I'm curious though, what happens to the Kerbals inside it if you deflate the units?
This... May be better than the Home modules. Seriously- It looks amazing!

Nice, I'm curious though, what happens to the Kerbals inside it if you deflate the units?
Euh... May be they deflate too and fold to be store in the glove box? Seriously, nothing happened. Kerbal can be in the pod when it deflates without any injury but I count on players to make it realistic.
How is Icarus going so far? I would like to make a suggestion; make Icarus 1 mile long, just like the Pegasus in BBC: Space Odyssey voyage to the planets.

How is Icarus going so far? I would like to make a suggestion; make Icarus 1 mile long, just like the Pegasus in BBC: Space Odyssey voyage to the planets.
I'm making Icarus as big as VAB can permit.
Will it be STTO Capible? Or will the Icarus have a launch vehicle?
